Introduction
This topic contains information on reviewing applications to determine the benefit sought, including
using a claimant’s entries on
VA Form 21-526
,
Veteran’s Application for Compensation and/or Pension
, to determine which benefit the claimant is seeking
discretionary application of 38 CFR 3.151(a)
processing additional correspondence received with a prescribed form
examples of situations involving additional correspondence received with a prescribed form
receipt of EZ Form requesting a different benefit application
, and
considering unclaimed theories of SC
.
title: M21-1, Part II, Subpart iii, Chapter 1, Section A - Applications for Benefits
citation: Part II, Subpart iii, Chapter 1, Section A
